text: @CarlosCMTF @XMoralHazardX @burgerfiedfuuka @randybl1959 @ScottGottliebMD What is the advantage of the herd immunity scenerio? Most of Europe & Asia is gradually returning to normal, but Swedes are mostly banned from travel because so many of them carry a deadly disease. Their strategy is terrible for their health & terrible for their economy.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
